name: ahk-mcp
description: AutoHotkey v2 Development Tools with LSP-like Capabilities
long_description: Comprehensive AutoHotkey v2 MCP server providing intelligent code analysis, file management, script execution, and context-aware assistance for LLMs working with AutoHotkey code. Features 33+ tools including smart orchestration, advanced editing, debug agents, and complete AutoHotkey v2 documentation integration.
